Description: Fragment of Laconian black-glazed pottery stirrup krater with part of rim, handle-plate, neck and shoulder; interior glazed dull black with two added red bands; exterior glazed except for underside of handle plate; inscription on top of handle plate.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs in Stibbe's All Black Krater Group (Stibbe 1989, 37-43).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GC.51) (phase 3)
